title: Beat Bronze With Support :p

embed.description: Create & discover new Champion builds/strategies, check your Summoner statistics and try our powerful LoL charts.

body: So beautiful and so much fun to play support. I feel proud of my ranked stats and just wanted to show anything is possible just do your best every game. Always improve, you can blame a feeder but sometimes you can pull together as a team and win. Throws happen in bronze. I know people always say exactly what I just said but legit do it. Focus on doing your absolute best.  Just play to improve and you will improve. Had a 2 and 32 xin zhao and we still won. Always play your best and I bet you will gain elo. NO LONGER BRONZE!!! SUPPORT MAIN OP!
